mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, ANTISTOP, DESCR, PARENTID, PARENTFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, ANTISTOP1, ANTISTOP2, ANTISTOP3, ANTISTOP4, ANTISTOP5, TOTALSALES, TOTALLISTINGS, SUCESSFULLISTING, BIDS, ITEMSSOLD, AVERAGEPRICE, SELLTHROUGH, RANK, NAME, REMARK, SORT from DB_ANTISTOP where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, ANTISTOP, DESCR, PARENTID, PARENTFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, ANTISTOP1, ANTISTOP2, ANTISTOP3, ANTISTOP4, ANTISTOP5, TOTALSALES, TOTALLISTINGS, SUCESSFULLISTING, BIDS, ITEMSSOLD, AVERAGEPRICE, SELLTHROUGH, RANK, NAME, REMARK, SORT from DB_ANTISTOP
